text: Anyone else experiencing issues when adding new languages variants to globale modules? I was able to add new languages yesterday, but not today

Shout out to <@UGDF9EBPW> and <@UJAPS2K4N> for hosting today's Developer HUG, starting in just under 2 hours! We love to see the developer community share their knowledge, and loop in HubSpotters like <@UD53A9UUR> and <@U6W3H6YN8> while they're at it! Today's talk will be all about scaling content through HubDB and Custom Objects. should be a good one :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-from-stagnant-to-scalable-powering-web-content-with-hubdb-and-custom-objects/>
Pretty much the maximum amount of HubSpot knowledge there could possibly be in one livestream.
That's when we have you on stage <@U01QVR44MEY>

<@U2H3TT8F2> so I've been trying to use the quote templates, and when I go to customize, half the time i'll be met with a blank page in the iframe (the sidebar loads).

The network requests seems to be stuck on a request to <wss://HubSpot-eu-realtime.ably.io/>
ah it seems that's only if i refresh the preview, which then causes the access token to be incorrect. If i back out by clicking exit then go back it, it loads fine.

Hi! I'm not sure if this is the right channel, but I've got a question regarding the removal of properties in HubSpot projects:

We recently archived and then permanently removed a (contact) property in our project because it was missing a unique constraint (these can't be added retroactively). Now we would like to add these properties again, with the same property name, but a general error message is shown when doing do. This error dissapears once we add a suffix to the property name, indicating the error has to do with the property name.

How can we re-add properties with a name that has already been used in the past?
